scripts.build: npm run build:db && tsc && npm run build:css && npm run copy:assets
scripts.copy:assets: mkdir -p dist/assets && cp -R assets/* dist/assets/ && mkdir -p dist/frontend && cp -R frontend/* dist/frontend/
scripts.watch:assets: nodemon --watch assets --watch frontend --ext html,css,js,png,jpg,svg,ico --exec 'npm run copy:assets'
scripts.dev: npm run build:db && npm run build && concurrently "npm run watch:ts" "npm run watch:css" "npm run watch:assets" "npm run dev:server"
scripts.dev:fastify: npm run build && concurrently "npm run watch:ts" "npm run watch:css" "npm run watch:assets" "fastify start -w -l info -P dist/app.js"
scripts.refresh: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf dist && rm package-lock.json && npm i && npm run dev
